Parameter.value: root\cimv2::select PercentProcessorTime from Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfOS_Processor where name = '_Total'
select concat(concat(Parameter,'\t'),value) from v$nls_parameters where Parameter='NLS_CHARACTERSET'
select length(address) from v$sql where rownum<2
select nvl(value,'-') from v$parameter where name = 'db_domain'
select sql_text from (select sql_text,cpu_time/executions/1000 cputime from v$sqlarea where executions>0 order by cputime desc) where rownum<=10
select sql_text from (select sql_text ,disk_reads/executions diskreads from v$sqlarea where executions>0 order by diskreads desc) where rownum<=10
select sql_text from (select sql_text ,buffer_gets/executions buffer_get from v$sqlarea where executions>0 order by buffer_get desc) where rownum<=10
select sql_text from (select sql_text ,elapsed_time/executions elapse_time from v$sqlarea where executions>0 order by elapse_time desc) where rownum<=10
select value from v$sysstat where name = 'sorts (disk)'
select value from v$sysstat where name = 'sorts (memory)'
select value from v$sysstat where name = 'transaction rollbacks'
select value from v$sysstat where name = 'user commits'
select round(sum(bytes) / 1024 / 1024,2) from v$sgastat where pool='large pool'
select round(sum(bytes) / 1024 / 1024,2) from v$sgastat where pool='java pool'
select round(sum(bytes) / 1024 / 1024,2) from v$sgastat where name='log_buffer'
select round(value/1024/1024,2) from v$parameter where name = 'pga_aggregate_target'
select round(value/(trunc(sysdate - b.startup_time,3)*86400),2) from v$sysstat,v$instance b where name ='physical reads'
select round(value/(trunc(sysdate - b.startup_time,3)*86400),2) from v$sysstat,v$instance b where name ='physical writes'
select round(value/(trunc(sysdate - b.startup_time,3)*86400),2) from v$sysstat,v$instance b where name ='db block gets'
select round(value/(trunc(sysdate - b.startup_time,3)*86400),2) from v$sysstat,v$instance b where name ='consistent gets'
select round(value/(trunc(sysdate - b.startup_time,3)*86400),2) from v$sysstat,v$instance b where name ='parse count (total)'
select round(sum(value/(trunc(sysdate - b.startup_time,3)*86400)),2) from v$sysstat,v$instance b where name in('user rollbacks','user commits')
select value from v$sysstat where name ='physical reads'
select value/1024 from v$parameter where name='db_block_size'
select value from v$sysstat where name ='physical writes'
select value from v$sysstat where name ='db block gets'
select value from v$sysstat where name ='consistent gets'
select value from v$sysstat where name = 'parse count (total)'
select sum(value) from v$sysstat where name in('user rollbacks','user commits')
select round(sumsize/groupcount,2) avgsize from (select sum(bytes)/1024/1024 sumsize from v$log) a,(select count(distinct group#) groupcount from v$log) b
select nvl(round(sum(blocks*block_size)/1024/1024/1024,2),0) archivetotsize from v$archived_log where status='A'
select * from (select distinct SUBSTR(name,0,INSTR(TRANSLATE(name, '\', '/'), '/', -1, 1)) file_path from v$archived_log where status='A') where file_path is not null
select count(*) from dba_tablespaces where contents not in('TEMPORARY')

select decode((b.value+c.value),0,0,round(100*(1 - a.value/(b.value+c.value)),2)) from (select value from sys.v_$sysstat where name='physical reads') a, (select value from sys.v_$sysstat where name='db block gets') b,(select value from sys.v_$sysstat where name='consistent gets') c
select value from v$sysstat where name = 'sorts (memory)'
select value from v$sysstat where name = 'sorts (disk)'
select count(*) from v$session where username is not null
select value from v$sysstat where name ='logons cumulative'
select value from v$sysstat where name ='opened cursors current'
select count(*) from v$session where lockwait is not null
select value from v$sysstat where name ='enqueue deadlocks'
select value from v$sysstat where name = 'transaction rollbacks'
select value from v$sysstat where name = 'user commits'
select sql_text,EXECUTIONS from (select sql_text,EXECUTIONS from v$sqlarea order by EXECUTIONS desc) where rownum<=10
select COUNT(*) from v$session where status='INACTIVE'
root\cimv2::select PercentProcessorTime from Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfProc_Thread where Name like 'oracle'
root\cimv2::select name from Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfOS_Processor where name !='_Total'

LANG=en_US.utf8;pids=`ps -ef |egrep "oracle|ora_"|egrep -v egrep |awk '{thepids=thepids "," $2 ",";} END{printf "%s",thepids}'`;cpuNum=`cat /proc/cpuinfo | egrep "processor[[:space:]]*:" | wc -l`; top -b -n 2 -U oracle | awk -v pids=$pids -v cpuNum=$cpuNum '$1=="PID" {block_num++; next} block_num==2&&index(pids, "," $1 ",")>0{cpuUsage=cpuUsage+$9;} END{if(cpuNum!=0){cpuUsage=cpuUsage/cpuNum;}printf("%0.2f",cpuUsage);}'
setenv LANG en_US.UTF-8;ps -aux | egrep oracle | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $3}'
LANG=en_US.UTF-8;ps -eo 'pcpu comm args' | egrep oracle | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
ps -eo 'pcpu comm args' | egrep oracle | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
LANG=en_US.utf8;UNIX95= ps -eo 'pcpu comm args' |egrep oracle|egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'

LANG=en_US.utf8;pids=`ps -ef |egrep "oracle|ora_"|egrep -v egrep |awk '{thepids=thepids "," $2 ",";} END{printf "%s",thepids}'`;cpuNum=`cat /proc/cpuinfo | egrep "processor[[:space:]]*:" | wc -l`; top -b -n 2 -U oracle | awk -v pids=$pids -v cpuNum=$cpuNum '$1=="PID" {block_num++; next} block_num==2&&index(pids, "," $1 ",")>0{cpuUsage=cpuUsage+$9;} END{if(cpuNum!=0){cpuUsage=cpuUsage/cpuNum;}printf("%0.2f",cpuUsage);}'
setenv LANG en_US.UTF-8;ps -aux | egrep oracle | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $3}'
LANG=en_US.UTF-8;ps -eo 'pcpu comm args' | egrep oracle | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
ps -eo 'pcpu comm args' | egrep oracle | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
LANG=en_US.utf8;UNIX95= ps -eo 'pcpu comm args' |egrep oracle|egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
select value from V$pgastat where NAME='total PGA inuse'
select tablespace_name from dba_tablespaces where contents not in('TEMPORARY')
select tablespace_name,sum(bytes)/1024/1024 from dba_data_files group by tablespace_name

select tot.tablespace_name,round(tot.total - free.free,2) used_space from (select tablespace_name,(sum(bytes)/1024/1024) total from sys.dba_data_files group by tablespace_name) tot,(select tablespace_name,(sum(bytes)/1024/1024) free from sys.dba_free_space group by tablespace_name) free where free.tablespace_name = tot.tablespace_name
select tablespace_name,sum(bytes)/1024/1024 from dba_data_files group by tablespace_name

select tot.tablespace_name,round(100 - (free.free/tot.total)*100,2) used_pct from (select tablespace_name,(sum(bytes)/1048576) total from sys.dba_data_files group by tablespace_name) tot,(select tablespace_name,(sum(bytes)/1048576) free from sys.dba_free_space group by tablespace_name) free where free.tablespace_name=tot.tablespace_name
select tablespace_name,sqrt(max(blocks)/sum(blocks))*(100/sqrt(sqrt(count(blocks)))) FSFI from dba_free_space group by tablespace_name
select tablespace_name,sum(phyrds) rds from v$filestat a,dba_data_files b where a.FILE#=b.file_id group by b.tablespace_name
select tablespace_name,sum(phywrts) wrts from v$filestat a,dba_data_files b where a.FILE#=b.file_id group by b.tablespace_name
select tablespace_name,sum(blocks) from dba_free_space group by tablespace_name

select total.file_id,(case when (round((total.sumspace - free.freespace),2)='') then 0 else round((total.sumspace - free.freespace),2) end) from (select file_id,sum(bytes)/1024/1024 as freespace from dba_free_space group by file_id) free,(select file_id,file_name,sum(bytes)/1024/1024 as sumspace from dba_data_files group by file_id,file_name) total where free.file_id=total.file_id
select a.file#,round(phyblkrd/(trunc(sysdate - b.startup_time,3)*86400),2) from v$filestat a,v$instance b
select a.file#,round(phyblkwrt/(trunc(sysdate - b.startup_time,3)*86400),2) from v$filestat a,v$instance b

select total.file_id,(case when (round(100*(total.sumspace-free.freespace)/total.sumspace,2)='') then 0 else round(100*(total.sumspace-free.freespace)/total.sumspace,2) end) from (select file_id,sum(bytes)/1024/1024 as freespace from dba_free_space group by file_id) free,(select file_id,file_name,sum(bytes)/1024/1024 as sumspace from dba_data_files group by file_id,file_name) total where free.file_id=total.file_id
select bg.name, vi.instance_name from v$bgprocess bg, v$instance vi

select distinct SUBSTR(file_name,0,INSTR(TRANSLATE(file_name, '\', '/'), '/', -1, 1)) file_path from ( select file_name, 'dbfile' file_type from dba_data_files union select member, 'redolog' from v$logfile union select name, 'archivelog' from v$archived_log where status='A' union select name, 'controlfile' from v$controlfile)

WITH tmp AS (SELECT distinct SUBSTR(file_name, 0, INSTR(TRANSLATE(file_name, '\', '/'), '/', -1, 1)) file_path, file_type FROM (SELECT file_name, 'dbfile' file_type FROM dba_data_files UNION SELECT member, 'redolog' FROM v$logfile UNION SELECT name, 'archivelog' FROM v$archived_log WHERE status='A' UNION SELECT name, 'controlfile' FROM v$controlfile)) SELECT file_path, rtrim(xmlagg(xmlelement(s,file_type,';').extract('//text()') order by file_type), ',') FROM tmp GROUP BY file_path

SELECT lgfile.MEMBER, lg.bytes FROM gv$logfile lgfile,gv$log lg,gv$instance inst WHERE lgfile.INST_ID = lg.INST_ID AND lgfile.GROUP# = lg.GROUP# AND inst.INSTANCE_NAME = '${SID}' AND lgfile.INST_ID = inst.INST_ID AND lg.THREAD# = inst.THREAD#
SELECT lgfile.MEMBER FROM gv$logfile lgfile,gv$instance inst WHERE lgfile.INST_ID=inst.INST_ID AND inst.INSTANCE_NAME='${SID}'

SELECT lgfile.MEMBER, lg.archived FROM gv$logfile lgfile,gv$log lg,gv$instance inst WHERE lgfile.INST_ID = lg.INST_ID AND lgfile.GROUP# = lg.GROUP# AND inst.INSTANCE_NAME = '${SID}' AND lgfile.INST_ID = inst.INST_ID AND lg.THREAD# = inst.THREAD#

SELECT lgfile.MEMBER, lg.status FROM gv$logfile lgfile,gv$log lg,gv$instance inst WHERE lgfile.INST_ID = lg.INST_ID AND lgfile.GROUP# = lg.GROUP# AND inst.INSTANCE_NAME = '${SID}' AND lgfile.INST_ID = inst.INST_ID AND lg.THREAD# = inst.THREAD#

SELECT lgfile.MEMBER, lg.first_change# FROM gv$logfile lgfile,gv$log lg,gv$instance inst WHERE lgfile.INST_ID = lg.INST_ID AND lgfile.GROUP# = lg.GROUP# AND inst.INSTANCE_NAME = '${SID}' AND lgfile.INST_ID = inst.INST_ID AND lg.THREAD# = inst.THREAD#

SELECT lgfile.MEMBER, lg.first_time FROM gv$logfile lgfile,gv$log lg,gv$instance inst WHERE lgfile.INST_ID = lg.INST_ID AND lgfile.GROUP# = lg.GROUP# AND inst.INSTANCE_NAME = '${SID}' AND lgfile.INST_ID = inst.INST_ID AND lg.THREAD# = inst.THREAD#

PluginResultMetaInfo.columns: 会话ID,会话用户名,模式名,客户端机器名,客户端操作系统用户名,会话类型,客户端应用程序,登陆时间,会话状态

Parameter.value: select SID,USERNAME,SCHEMANAME,MACHINE,OSUSER,TYPE,PROGRAM,LOGON_TIME,STATUS from v$session where USERNAME is not null
select r.segment_name,r.segment_id,r.owner,r.tablespace_name,r.status,stat.extents,stat.xacts,stat.curext,stat.curblk from dba_rollback_segs r left join v$rollstat stat on r.segment_id = stat.usn
select JOB, BROKEN, FAILURES, INSTANCE, LAST_DATE, LAST_SEC, NEXT_DATE, NEXT_SEC, TOTAL_TIME, LOG_USER, PRIV_USER, SCHEMA_USER from dba_jobs
select JOB, BROKEN, FAILURES, INSTANCE, LAST_DATE, LAST_SEC, NEXT_DATE, NEXT_SEC, TOTAL_TIME, LOG_USER, PRIV_USER, SCHEMA_USER from dba_jobs
select JOB, BROKEN, FAILURES, INSTANCE, LAST_DATE, LAST_SEC, NEXT_DATE, NEXT_SEC, TOTAL_TIME, LOG_USER, PRIV_USER, SCHEMA_USER from dba_jobs
select JOB, BROKEN, FAILURES, INSTANCE, LAST_DATE, LAST_SEC, NEXT_DATE, NEXT_SEC, TOTAL_TIME, LOG_USER, PRIV_USER, SCHEMA_USER from dba_jobs
select JOB, BROKEN, FAILURES, INSTANCE, LAST_DATE, LAST_SEC, NEXT_DATE, NEXT_SEC, TOTAL_TIME, LOG_USER, PRIV_USER, SCHEMA_USER from dba_jobs
select JOB, BROKEN, FAILURES, INSTANCE, LAST_DATE, LAST_SEC, NEXT_DATE, NEXT_SEC, TOTAL_TIME, LOG_USER, PRIV_USER, SCHEMA_USER from dba_jobs
select JOB, BROKEN, FAILURES, INSTANCE, LAST_DATE, LAST_SEC, NEXT_DATE, NEXT_SEC, TOTAL_TIME, LOG_USER, PRIV_USER, SCHEMA_USER from dba_jobs
select JOB, BROKEN, FAILURES, INSTANCE, LAST_DATE, LAST_SEC, NEXT_DATE, NEXT_SEC, TOTAL_TIME, LOG_USER, PRIV_USER, SCHEMA_USER from dba_jobs
select JOB, BROKEN, FAILURES, INSTANCE, LAST_DATE, LAST_SEC, NEXT_DATE, NEXT_SEC, TOTAL_TIME, LOG_USER, PRIV_USER, SCHEMA_USER from dba_jobs
select JOB, BROKEN, FAILURES, INSTANCE, LAST_DATE, LAST_SEC, NEXT_DATE, NEXT_SEC, TOTAL_TIME, LOG_USER, PRIV_USER, SCHEMA_USER from dba_jobs
select JOB, BROKEN, FAILURES, INSTANCE, LAST_DATE, LAST_SEC, NEXT_DATE, NEXT_SEC, TOTAL_TIME, LOG_USER, PRIV_USER, SCHEMA_USER from dba_jobs
select JOB, BROKEN, FAILURES, INSTANCE, LAST_DATE, LAST_SEC, NEXT_DATE, NEXT_SEC, TOTAL_TIME, LOG_USER, PRIV_USER, SCHEMA_USER from dba_jobs
select sid,username,lockwait,status,machine,program from v$session where sid in (select session_id from v$locked_object) and lockwait is not null
setenv LANG en_US.UTF-8;cat /var/run/dmesg.boot | grep -i "real memory" | awk '{printf "%d",$4/1024}'
setenv LANG en_US.UTF-8;cat /var/run/dmesg.boot | grep -i "real memory" | awk '{printf "%d",$4/1024}'
